overview: Set against the backdrops of Madurai city,the story revolves around a girl ,who pursues a graduation course at a private college,where she undergoes sexual harassment.Her attempts to raise her voice against these evil miscreant  go eclipsed due to the strong influence of money and the domination of the ruling class  During this juncture , She meets a social activist named puli and shares pathos. The crux of the film is all about the attempts of the character’ puli ‘ who want to seek justice for the sake of this innocent girl and bring the evildoers before the law
title: Oonkaram
